Review.Contenu: The whole measurement process could have been different I purchased your tool and I didn’t need it I learned this from a tech from Window Nation who told me that the measurement was on the frame

Review.Titre: We used the Flexscreen tool as per…
Review.Contenu: We used the Flexscreen tool as per flexscreens instructions, messured 3 times to be exact. Three of the screens are an inch larger and will not even come close to fitting. 2 screens were 1/4inch to big and we got them in but because so tight the screen itself is slack. I should have just messured the screens I have to be sure but did it flexscreens way which says "Do not measure your current screens. Thus I spent a large amount of money for screens that do not fit.
While no problem purchasing. Product received was not what we had hoped. Seems fragile. Incapable of preventing stink bugs from getting through. And just not up to par.

Review.Titre: Very disappointed in how they securely…
Review.Contenu: Very disappointed in how they securely they fit the windows. I’m trying to get them to stay in using the stick on foam but I greatly regret the purchase. Also, 4 of the 12 screens were made too small (not to the dimensions I provided) and they are supposed to be remade.

The window measurements seem straight forward but not all windows are square.  The top and bottom measurements are usually different.  An explanation on what to do in those instances would have helped greatly.  One screen we ordered was too small and the other was slightly too big.  We will not order another Flex Screen.

The return policy is a joke. For how expensive these screens are, customers are getting trapped into buying something they might not like and then are stuck with. Customer service is also a joke, I've never bought something where you have 0 time to adjust the order after hitting submit. I will never recommend this product to friends and family, especially for how expensive they are.To be fair they screens do seem to "work" though. But that's the highest praise I can give. My rigid frame screens from two years ago are actually better though because they seal around the window tighter. These FlexScreens have MASSIVE gaps around the window frame, letting bigger bugs like stink bugs just crawl around.

Review.Titre: Size is incorrect on all screens
Review.Contenu: Size is incorrect on all screens. Currently working with Support to get new screens. Submitted sizes are accurate.

Review.Titre: The screen was not as good as our original screen
Review.Contenu: The screen was not as good as a regularly framed screen. Our experience was sub par.  And of course, you can't return it.

Review.Titre: I think Flexscreen is a good product in…
Review.Contenu: I think Flexscreen is a good product in theory,but my experience was not what I expected.  Maybe the website was a little confusing.  On the page where it tells the customer to subtract 1/16 of an inch or 3/16ths, depending on pocket and then on the order page it subtracts 1/16 from the actual measurement, which I did,  Therefore, the screen frames are oversize and buckled which makes the screen itself look like a burlap bag and wavy.  I guess, I should have reduced the measured size by another 1/8 and it probably would be a lot better.  I will not recommend Flex screens to anyone.Mike Olson

Review.Titre: 4 of the 6 screens were the wrong size
Review.Contenu: 4 of the 6 screens were the wrong size. They won't give a partial refund or give any compensation. They want me to do extra work and send them pictures of the screen measurements so they can send me new ones. I just want a refund since they got less that 50 percent right.

The product is fine.  The cost is expensive, especially after the owner expressed on TV what the cost to manufacture is.  I'll be glad screens to do my entire house when the cost per unit reflects multiple windows with the same sizes, single shipment boxes and multiple window orders.

Pretty terrible. Advertised to be a flat rate for the screens so I placed my order. Went in to enter my measurements and get my screens in production and the final submission page pops up with an alert that my order will incur a $200 shipping charge. THAT'S MORE THAN THE SCREENS COST! Terrible way to advertise and hook your customer. I cancelled the order, this was a bit of a gamble being they have you measure your own windows and I'm not willing to more than double my investment in something I'm unsure of.

Review.Titre: No one ever responds back to inquiries
Review.Contenu: I had made several inquiries in the past on behalf of my company who was looking for a solution to their screen issues for their window orders and no one has every had the courtesy to call or email back. I can understand something falling through the cracks once ... but several times? I eventually got the impression they were snubbing us and didn't want our business because we were Canadian or who knows. That's too bad as we sell about 10,000 windows a year with a percentage of them being operatable requiring a screen solution. Maybe our volume was too low for them to lift a phone to call back or click a button to reply by email.

Review.Titre: The screens don't fit or stay in the…
Review.Contenu: The screens don't fit or stay in the window!!!I even bought the flexscreen measuring device, followed all of the instructions, took the measurements multiple times.I did flexscreen because I did not want to pay for installation but now I need new screens and installation.
These are garbage. These might keep out birds, but every type of bugs get through these screens. If our window guys measured correctly, these are useless! So disappointed and heartbroken.

Review.Titre: This review is for the company and its…BEWARE "OVERSIZE" shipping!
Review.Contenu: This review is for the company and its policies - NOT for the actual screen itself.  I ordered an "Oversize" screen - smaller than standard high but wider than standard - well within their size limits.  After placing the order with $35 shipping, I was told the new shipping total would be $235!  The screen itself only costs $65!  That is almost 7 TIMES the cost of regular shipping! When contacted, the company said they have no control over shipping costs.  The product is called FLEX screen for goodness sake.  All they have to do is loosely roll or fold the screen and it would fit into standard packaging.  By not really offering oversize shipping, they do not really offer non standard sizes.

None of the 4 screens I purchased are fitting.  I took time to measure and remeasure all aspects the window multiple times; I used the measuring tool and online tool which was very easy, however none of the screens fit the windows. While squeezing the screen to get it in, the screen is now out of shape.  I have tried putting moulding but still not fitting.    I would not recommend this product.  Time and money wasted.
Worst home accessory I've never purchased. And your survey is far worse. II am not a customer,  you should confirm purchase before soliciting praise. Review could have been worse than 1-Star

Review.Titre: I got the flex tool for measurements and followed their directions
Review.Contenu: I got the flex tool for measurements. I triple checked my measurements and based on their description of windows screen slots I used the deductions they called for … so in depth I have two of the “same window” but measured them so exact I found one to be 1/8” different than the other. What a waste of my money and time. The screen itself doesn’t appear to blow me away on build quality however the one star is because NONE of my four screens fit even remotely well in the channels. And then they send these “retention bumpers” to make a tighter fit, now I have to use these on every screen that I paid ALOT of money for doesn’t feel like a solid or even snug fit my screens move around now and seems ultimately like it will not form a good enough seal to keep bugs out. My advice is to not listen to them on how to measure and then substract. Just measure your space. For the record I have your average big brand name vinyl windows nothing special or limiting and followed their directions and it’s a horrible fit.

I contacted FlexScreen after receiving our order concerning the fact that they did not fit properly after completing following their measuring instructions.  I have yet to hear back from them as to how to proceed.  Not very customer service friendly after the sale.

Prices are way too high.Lifetime warranty makes me take pause when it says it only covers defects.  What exactly is a defect?  That is always up for debate and from my experience it will go the other way.  Will the company still be in business if the screen material disintegrates in 20 years?  There is no telling.  If it does, is that a defect, wear/tear, or environmental damage that is not covered under defect?  In addition, it says the screens have to be shipped back.  Shipping can be expensive for large objects.  Sorry, this product does not make sense at this price point and I'm not enticed by the limited warranty wording.  I don't feel a bug screen is an investment.  Good luck.  Seems to be a unique product with a price structure that may not be realistic.

Absolutely terrible company. Purchased "FlexView" which they claim is more see-through/less noticeable than standard window screens. I took the risk as this is the exact reason we wanted new screens.In short: They are the same as standard screens. The fact that they even think they deserve this marketing moniker truly astounds me. Go to WalMart and buy a standard screen for 75% less. You get the same product.Upon asking for a refund: Was given a nice, simple nope.Awful company. Spend your money elsewhere. A true, garbage joke.

As others have noted recently, I was excited to have good screens for my condo. Unfortunately, what I got were screens that were up to a quarter of an inch smaller than what I'd specified on their online form--I took screenshots of those measurements, the stickers on the edge of each screen show those measurements, but my Stanley tape measure shows that they're uselessly smaller. I've contacted customer service 3 times, and now that I've sent them the requested photos of the dimension stickers (not sure why--the sticker dimensions are correct, the screens are not), they're ghosting me. I've called direct phone lines and left messages, I've replied to the same email thread that we've been communicating on, and they just don't seem to wish to deal with the issue. Like children.

Review.Titre: I measured the opening as you asked
Review.Contenu: I measured the opening as you asked. When I filled out the order you suggested that I go a little larger. Now I have a screen the does fit the opening it's just a little too big, it almost fits but doesn't. Not a great experience.

Review.Titre: Don't fit, and measured correctly. NO FIX. NO REFUND.
Review.Contenu: Total scam. No refunds or recourse. They don't stand behind their product at all. I spent about $650 on their screens and virtually none of them fit or stay in at all with my sill type, despite their repeated claims prior to purchase that this would work for me.In their videos they show people with their kids sitting on the screens implying they are somehow super durable, but just in the simple installation of my 10 or so screens, half of them easily tore on the edges of the aluminum frame.After giving me the run around on phone calls and over email for months, they basically said I would have to re-order $700 worth of screens if I wanted a fix. And then they just stopped replying to my emails altogether.Avoid these guys at all costs. Deceptive marketing, and zero help from customer service. Biggest waste of money I've ever spent on anything.

Review.Titre: Very disappointed with the fit and…
Review.Contenu: Very disappointed with the fit and finish. I used the device provided to enter the window measurements on to the website tool. The screens still came with a very loose fit. It was difficult to get the screen to stay in & it's clear that bugs will still get through the edges. for the amount of money i paid, I do not recommend these to anyone.

Review.Titre: Screens are hazardous to small children and animals
Review.Contenu: Had this screen installed in winter of 2019 with a new front window - I wasn't advised of this product being used. A few months later in spring when I opened the window, at some point my cat must have leaned on the screen and it and the cat fell out, missing for days. What if it was a toddler who leaned on it? The company came and installed an additional screen, but I still won't open my front window out of fear. Waste of money, they're garbage!

Took a while for owner to help with my measurements originally bought 9 but had them send only 1 and we were very disappointed when the screen came out if the frame when lifting out if the box2nd problem... Now way to hold on for install when on a 2nd story window...bad design I will wait for something better.

WARNING: This company appears to be a fraudulent operation. They took my money and never delivered anything. They won't give me a refund and their "customer service" is non-responsive. Do not fall for this scam.

Concept seems great. Price is high but there was an advertised warranty so we tried it. Screen is okay at best. Customer service is horrible and will not respond to multiple website messages and emails. Warranty is good because there is no way to register the screen. Would not buy again at this point.

Spent over $700.00 on 6 screens and they were at least a 1/2 off I measured by there solutions and there is NO customer service at all , no “ sorry we will fix this or give us another chance “ they person I spoke with talked to me like I was a child that had to be scolded for something , they are a bul:$&t company , if a shark invested in this company . They were USED as bait . Scam company and according to the other reviews they aren’t worth your time and SAVE your money . They need to be on SCAM tank , just a con man coming onto that show to solicit a shark to promote a scam . I feel bad for 2 things...... the shark that invested in this company and for buying GARBAGE!! BUYERS BEWARE!!!!! SCAM

Review.Titre: I don't like your system for receiving measurements
Review.Contenu: I don't like your system for receiving measurements.  I'm a remodeler and know how to use a tape and laser measure.  I'd rather just give you the dimensions I want.The screens I ended up with are about a 1/4 inch too tall.

Review.Titre: Soooo Many bad reviews/ Flex Screen
Review.Contenu: Soooo Many bad reviews, I’m out!!! Just saw you guys tonight on Shark Tank, was willing, then  I thought I should read the reviews....... shame on you!!!!   If ANYONE has a problem, according  to the reviews, ..........TOO BAD, suck it up........ AND, there was AT THE LEAST $700.00 involved in these purchases by regular folks, like you and me. I would love to be supportive of any company that is honest in regards to their product.  It appears to me that this company is trying to make a buck while they F anyone dumb enough to purchase, without looking at the reviews!!!!! So don’t be a dumb ass, look at the reviews!!!!! I cannot do more than this!!!!

I purchased four screens when they arrived they were smaller than the dimensions I ordered.  Customer service stated that they had to be smaller for installation.  Three of the screens are in but there is a gap on one side and if you touch them they fall out.  The fourth is so small it will not even touch on three sides.  Customer service stated that it is not their problem as they built the screens to the sizes provided.  After arguing that the product received was smaller than dimensions ordered the agent dismissed me by stating there was nothing that could be done and basically it is what it is. Garbage product and garbage Customer service.  I will not recommend this product/company to anyone.
These screens are cheaply made and warp in the center.  Not a great fit despite the correct measurements.  The company does not offer refunds either.  SAVE YOUR MONEY.  DO NOT BUY!

Review.Titre: They Do Not Fit My Windows.
Review.Contenu: I am a little unhappy with the finished product because it is too tall and will not fit the window. The product is probably a good product but since it won't fit I can not give it more than one star. I received 3 screens (as a trial) and was thinking of ordering for my whole house. Customer Service was VERY nice and wanted to replace the screens however I would have to pay for the shipping, $108, That's about 3/4 of the original amount just to replace the ones that are too tall. I declined since I didn't want to waste any more money on something that I couldn't use in the first place. I did use their video and measuring guide but they still were too tall. I'm sorry I have to give them one star but they ask me for my review...

Good Morning!I was so thrilled when I saw this product on Shark Tank! It was the solution I was looking for - practical, efficient, and clean and I ordered it right the way!I was really surprised with how fast it was delivered - since it is a personalized product I thought it would take weeks.When my screens arrived my family and I were leaving for Indiana, so we decided to open the boxes and check the screens once we were back home. We opened the boxes and I was disappointed to find they were not labeled, even though on the website, we were asked which room each screen would go. Then, upon opening each of the seven screens I ordered I noticed all but two of them were crooked and one was ripped. Their borders were also damaged, so it definitely compromised our ability install them.So,  5 out of 7 in total were damaged. I need these screens to be replaced, because they really can't be used the way they are.Thank you very much for your time and I hope to hear from you soon.Rosangela Monaco

Review.Titre: The screen fits but falls out at just a…
Review.Contenu: The screen fits but falls out at just a mild touch making it impossible to open my windows as all you have to do is touch them and they fall out.
Stop emailing me. I never signed up for this mailing list, you keep adding me through data gathered from LinkedIn. I have unsubscribed multiple times.

We had confusion measuring our windows because they are horizontal sliders so they are too wide to get a flex screen. When we were told by a representative that we would have to get half screens he informed us there would be a gap where bugs would be able to get in. Another lady was also of no help. Between talking to two people, with MUCH confusion with both of them,  neither of them ever once asked what type of window we have. At a third phone call for help, trying to decide if we should settle on a screen with a gap, and complaining that the website should ask you what type of window you have, the lady told us there is no way they could do that because there are so many types. REALLY? REALLY?! You sell window screens!!! Eventually I did research, found out the retail side sells a special type that has the edge that would prevent bugs from coming in. The lady FINALLY informed me that she could transfer this to their retail side to fulfill the order so that we would have no gaps in our half window screens. In the end, all that was sent was our screens with an additional slide on that would prevent the bugs. This was fine. But WHY DO YOU NOT OFFER THIS TO CUSTOMERS FROM THE BEGINNING?!?! THIS WAS ONE OF THE CRAZIEST CUSTOMER SERVICE EXPERIENCES IVE EVER HAD AND THE SOLUTION WAS SO SO SIMPLE. WHY ISN'T THIS SLIDE ON GAP PROTECTER JUST OFFERED ON THE REGULAR SITE???!!!

Review.Titre: Product may be OK but I will never know
Review.Contenu: The product seems to be good however when my screens arrived the were too tall. They would remake them but I had to pay $108 shipping to get the replacement three screens sent out. That is way too much to find out even If I like them. I'm sure it is a good product but I can not give any good ratings when they did not work.
Still haven't received the measuring tool after a week and a half, no response to my emails.

Sent and email through their website, never received a reply. There screens may be great - don't know since they don't reply to emails on their site. An email they clearly received in order to have put me on a review list.

Review.Titre: I didn't buy anything from your website…
Review.Contenu: I didn't buy anything from your website but keep getting review requests.  1 star for that.  Email also appears to be from 1995

Very disappointed! These look like great screens, and I was excited to finally get a screen for my odd-size kitchen window that is almost twice as wide as it is tall. But when I received the screen, it could not be installed despite being nearly the right dimensions (1/16 over even though I subtracted it) because there is ZERO amount of flex on the sides. All the videos I've seen of this product show it should flex easily at the sides. The screen flexes plenty vertically – top and bottom – but without any side flex it just won't go in my window. And I know they got the orientation right because the label is in the lower right corner where it should be. If they can't make wider-than-tall windows to flex at the sides, then they should put that warning on the order page and I would have ordered it shorter at the sides and used their little rubber make-it-fit thingies (which they didn't send, by the way, though they are supposed to be included in the order). I had ordered it through Home Depot so I went through their customer service and was told that this company had reviewed the photos I sent and decided that it was "built within tolerance so there will be no refund." Talk about leaving the customer holding the bag! That would have been $70 wasted if Home Depot had not given me a full refund – kudos to them. So now I have a screen I can't install, a kitchen window with still no screen, and three more (standard-size) windows that need screens, but I will have to find another solution for them because it would be unwise to deal further with a company that can't be relied on to do the right thing.

Bought screens for my whole home under the premise they work on any windows (as advertised).  I paid for the highest level of protection (solar screens) and they arrived scuffed.  They did not work on my windows and fall out constantly (especially after rainfall).  I also cannot see out of my windows after rain due to the high density of the solar screens- you might as well cover my windows with black construction paper.  These screens are completely pointless and expensive.  We contacted customer service who responded we should purchase a different level of protection than solar screens (yes, please let me sink more money into screens that fall out of my window).  They then stopped responding to our follow up emails.  Their customer service is a joke, especially after spending as much money as we did.  I understand there is a no money back guarantee, but if you're going to advertise your screens work on any window that should be true.  Flexscreen should be ashamed of themselves, they don't stand behind their product and therefore offer no guarantees/returns.  Purchase at your own risk, or better yet, stay far away from this scam of a company.Response to flexscreen's response- it is not a measuring issue, as we've told you in several emails. We got your measuring tool before ordering and my husband works in mathematics. We also got a second opinion from a contractor who agreed it's not a measuring issue. The contractor said your screens would never work on our windows due to the way our home is constructed.  I'm not interested in spending more money on your faulty screens and unless you're willing to offer a refund, I'm not interested in waiting weeks for a response from your customer service team. Your last solution was to purchase a different level of screens, which we will never do. I've already wasted enough money.

Ordered screens several weeks ago, admittedly during the Coronavirus outbreak, but your website didnt give any information about ordering and I havent had any communication from you since I placed he order. Not great customer service.

Review.Titre: Email response non existent.  No reply to request
Review.Contenu: I sent an email regarding a possible order of 13 6 foot screens and no one has contacted me to answer my questions.

Review.Titre: I purchased 11 screens for all of my…
Review.Contenu: I purchased 11 screens for all of my windows. I viewed their video on how to measure the windows. I measured exactly how the video showed. When I received the screens they were about 1/4 inch too big. They wouldn't even fit in my windows. It was a waste of $700. The screens seemed like they were very cheap to make with an equally high markup.

Review.Titre: The screens were the wrong size
Review.Contenu: The screens were the wrong size, and now you want to do a bunch of stuff to prove it, I don't have time for this.  Process was much to complex, and you did not handle your mistake well.

Review.Titre: ever since you joined with those shark…
Review.Contenu: ever since you joined with those shark tank guys - it's way too expensive - too bad - it could have been a great productgood news - there are now other options

Review.Titre: The problem is you pay first
Review.Contenu: The problem is you pay first, then they point you to a video which tells you the thickness of the screen, and also when you find out they won't work.  Don't pay first.  What a horrible way to design a site for the consumer.

Review.Titre: I do not own a flexscreen
Review.Contenu: I do not own a flexscreen, but you keep sending me e-mails asking me to review the product. Take me off your mailing list.

Review.Titre: My screens work great one small problem…
Review.Contenu: My screens work great one small problem my magnets are wearing out.Please let me know where I can purchase them

Review.Titre: Never used flexscreen therefore I will…
Review.Contenu: Never used flexscreen therefore I will have to give it 1 star for the continuous emails
Received very little help with measuring and addressing the problem I had,. I canceled my order
$70 for 1 screen, what a joke! These are definitely not for the average home owner!
Pricey, pricey, price too high. Rediculous!Love product but too too expensive and I’m upper middle class! Sorry

Review.Titre: I have yet to receive the product
Review.Contenu: I have yet to receive the product.  It has been approx 10 days since the items was declared shipped.
We were intrigued by these when we saw them on TV, so we went to the site to check them out. But they are way to expensive!
We ordered 2 screens. One screen fit perfectly. The other did not. When we reached out to support, we heard NOTHING.
Not great, it doesn't stand up to well and you have to be straight on without blurry view
Have never received my screen. Was ordered almost 2 weeks ago

Review.Titre: Terrible was the second screen they…
Review.Contenu: Terrible was the second screen they sent out. It was too tight and produced gaps all around the sides.

Review.Titre: Flex screen is extremely over priced
Review.Contenu: Flex screen is extremely over priced. It seemed like a good product when I saw it on Shark Tank.
Came broken. Waiting for replacement.

My original screen had a one piece frame and fit easily into my window pocket. The replacement that I just received had a spliced frame and where the splice occured it was larger than my window pocket and needed to be beaten in the pocket with a screw driver and hammer. Not sure I'll be able to get it out now when I need to clean my windows. Two thumbs down, from me.Mark Carper

Quick service but not what was advertised. The website claims beautifully invisible. Which the screens are not. As a matter of fact they are black and not gray.  Gray makes the screens invisible on your home and black makes them stand out and not match anything else on my home.  No refund or help was given to remedy the issue.  So I’m stuck with two screens at 180 bucks total that I won’t display at all.

Terrible Screens. They advertise that they're flexible on the sides but they're only flexible in the middle on the sides. As a result I have not been able to get them over the lip of the track. Waste of money! And they made them 1/8 too high but even if they had been accurate the lack of flexibility would have prevented me from using them. So disappointed. Don't waste your money.

Review.Titre: This was completely the wrong size
Review.Contenu: This was completely the wrong size.  6 feet tall and 4 feet wide.  Not what I ordered

Review.Titre: My screen was 3 years old in a concrete…
Review.Contenu: My screen was 3 years old in a concrete building. They insist on re measuring the screen openings and sides. If they just made is easier and not making the process more confusing with pages and videos. Just answer one. Does your current screen fit right? Great measure the screen and enter here. I took a picture of the screen label and they just ignored it. I saw no box for the fuzzy piece at the top of the screen. So I didn't get that. It took about two weeks to get the screen and their antenna measuring device. I never received the first tool sent out. So I am with a useless screen.

While the concept is a good one, the measuring was confusing as mentioned in MANY other reviews. I thought I followed the instructions exactly but realized when I got them that I took the instructions to literally I guess. In addition, being “flexible” I assumed that meant they would be flexible and you could take them in and out. After taking them in and out twice, one has screen already pulling away from the edge. Not at all the quality I expected.

Ordered on May 10th 2021 and never heard a word  from the company, for 4 months, then sent a email on 9/9/21 asking what was going on with my order, didn't receive a reply (with no explanation besides your order has shipped) until 9/22/21.  I finally got the 1 screen I ordered to try them out and the sizing is wrong by a 1/4" top to bottom and side to side...Hoping to contact customer service and see what they say, to be continued...

Review.Titre: They have got to be kidding
Review.Contenu: I reached out to customerservice@flexscreenretail before leaving this review. They have got to be kidding. I told them that including Shipping, I paid $110 for one screen. It fit great, but Screen separated from frame and after writing to their customer service, they'll replace it if I first pay $70 for shipping!!! Screen lasted a half year. What a waste. Isn't there some way to pick it up at Home Depot or somewhere locally and skip the shipping? It's not like it lasted years. I'm in my 70s and on limited income. I have tried regluing screen to frame and finally used needle and thread to hold in place and keep scorpions out!!!

The screens don't fit. I spent a long time measuring and remeasuring for the screens.  I carefully followed the instructions and used the tool provided.  They are too loose.  The screens were supposed to come with some sort of spacers to help make the screens snug.  But they were not included.  I am very disappointed.

Review.Titre: 9 of 11 screens are the wrong size!
Review.Contenu: I purchased 11 screens, out of those 2 had significant tears out of the shipping box and 9 were not the correct size despite having the correct measurement labeled on the screen. I sent pictures to customer service but have received no answers except I may be required to send more pictures to document their errors. Horrible experience, I was willing to pay more per screen for the convenience of FlexScreen but that was a horrible decision given their manufacturing and customer service policies.

Terrible!  Whenever a Company has a disclaimer that they do not stand behind their product, it is a HUGE red flag.  We measured perfectly, triple checked and the screen arrived and is an hourglass shape when put in the window.  Biggest waste of $100 for a useless screen and when contacting them, they are condescending and unhelpful and blame mis-measuring as the issue.

Review.Titre: Poorly manufactured, not as sturdy as I needed
Review.Contenu: My screen arrived and the screen portion was not well attached to the frame, with a large gap where it should be glued down.  So the product is unusable.  I put it straight into the garbage, and will stick with traditional screens in the future.  You should redesign this product so that the screen is embedded in the frame, and not just glued.A replacement screen will be manufactured in the same way;  I purchased this product because I wanted a tough, hard to break screen to put up with my pets and kids.

Review.Titre: One of the screen was damaged and when…
Review.Contenu: One of the screen was damaged and when request replacement was asking $49.95 for shipping.That screen is 22 x 23 and weight about one poundI will not shop here again , because there warranty S. You pay almost the same price as if you buy the screen from anywhere.Don't shop there.

Looked like a great product.  Followed instructions on measuring however there was a clip on the top of the frame, that no matter which way we measured, they would not have fit.  It's very unfortunate that they have no accountability for product that won't work.  Do not recommend.The reply simply reiterated what I already knew.  The screens won't fit, but if I want to spend MORE money, I can try a new size with gap fillers.  No thanks.

Review.Titre: Screen doesn't fit. Beware if no pockets.
Review.Contenu: Followed instructions carefully for pocketless window frame but still ended up with screen that was too large to use. This was a very disappointing experience.  Had to throw away the oversized expensive screen.  Frankly measuring the old screen probably would have been perfect but instructions said not to do this.

Review.Titre: I ordered four screens to try them out…
Review.Contenu: I ordered four screens to try them out before ordering the rest.  Two of my screens do not fit and with no way to return them it’s a complete waste of money.  I used the measuring tool that was sent and they are still too big.  I won’t plan to buy any more in fear that I will measure wrong.

Review.Titre: I would not recommend buying these
Review.Contenu: I would not recommend buying these. Really do not fit tight in middle of the window edge. Bumpers do not help. Measuring takes a lot time. We did it and rechecked 4 more time because wanted to be sure the measurements were accurate. They arrived quickly and screen is clear.

Review.Titre: Do not purchase, quality is not that great, wouldn’t hold up in any storm!!!
Review.Contenu: The screen doesn’t fit.  I measured it to the screen and it doesn’t work right. The black thing that is supposed to snap in is too thick.  The screen is not flush the black square, so it is not well made.  THE WORST PRODUCT I HAVE PURCHASED. I spent $$$ and now it is going on the trash..... what a horrible product as it’s not returnable. DO NOT PURCHASE!!!!

Review.Titre: If I could give it a zero I would
Review.Contenu: If I could give it a zero I would. I ordered 5 screens and the first two ripped immediately. When I told them, they said it's rare screens rip, but it does happen. They will not take a return or give a refund. They will only send replacement screens. What happens when those are ripped too? More replacements. The customer service is horrible and the screens themselves are poorly made. Stay away from this product at all costs. It is not worth your time or aggravation.
Not interested. Spam mail.

Review.Titre: Product for the price is garbage
Review.Contenu: Your measuring tool is garbage. Instead of having a way to put in exact measurements you have a list of measurements to pick from and you can't get a proper fitting screen. The material the screen is made from could not be any cheaper. I had a screen rip from trying to instal it.

Review.Titre: Well was totally excited to get new…
Review.Contenu: Well was totally excited to get new screens, bit pricey but willing to try... Until they refused to even give me an estimate on shipping? on the site says free if you buy more than 4... except on oversized screens.. OK,  so after reading their contract ( the small pint) I called, they said buy them 1st and then we'll figure out the shipping after words...I'm sorry but in my world I don't pay for something until I find out the REAL costs.. I won't be doing any business with this company..

Review.Titre: i havent even recieved the product
Our screen came to us with the screen…
Review.Contenu: Our screen came to us with the screen pulling away from the side. The screen had a tear, but it appeared the box was damaged from fedex because the tear in the screen was the same area the box was damaged. I would not recommend anyone to buy this product.

TERRIBLE CUSTOMER SERVICE!I can't tell you how disappointing it was to try and work with these guys! I placed and order late afternoon and after placing my order realized a did not account for a dimension, I emailed them the next morning and they said "sorry it's to late to make a change"! Who does business this way? Obviously they're not concerned about customer satisfaction or future business! I would never do business with these crooks again! In addition you have to pay in advance of being able to place your order and there was no customer service available to help you!

your process is totally f********edeach side of the pockets on my window are different and your form only asks for one side of the top and one for each side.... what a cluster f..............Geeeeeezusssss

Review.Titre: Tired of trying to get it done right
Review.Contenu: Wrong screens sent. No indication of screen material sent. Second screen too small and damaged due to poor packing. Third one fits but has a small pucker. I’m just tired of dealing with them so I’m keeping a very over priced screen with a pucker

I have had 3 screens screen shipped to me and every screen was short by give or take a 1/4 inch. The last one also had a hole in the screen. Sandy at customer service was great each time. Each time I sent pictures of me measuring the screen, the measurement and the sticker on the screen labeling what the measurement should have been. Short every time. This last time they had to redo it, I was assured that the plant manager would personally check the screen. That was the shortest one of all. Not even close. I really wanted this to work but I can't go through this again. Thanks again to Sandy for all your help. You were the best part of this experience.

Not worth the money. They are custom made so no returns.  The fit will keep birds out of your house but not frogs,  lizards or bugs. Save your money and hire a window company to remake you new screens.

Review.Titre: Shame on me for not reading the reviews…
Review.Contenu: Shame on me for not reading the reviews here before ordering.  We measured our windows per the instructions, however our windows have a little clip on the top to hold the upper panel in..  this prevented the screens from fitting properly.  One screen came damaged.  They were happy to replace the one screen, bit since they wouldn't fit, why bother.  I asked if they would make the replacement screen to accommodate the clip, and they wouldn't do it.They did offer to remake all of the for $10 each and $35 shipping.  So that basically tells you what the screens cost them.  Pure crap!  I wouldn't do business with this company if I had the chance to do it over again.  And how do their employees sleep at night knowing they are helping to screw people out of their hard earned money?

Review.Titre: Came about a 1/4-1/2 inch smaller than…
Review.Contenu: Came about a 1/4-1/2 inch smaller than ordered on both sides..and is way to small for my windows... despite following their instructions exactly on measuring required size
Positively a quality product, but not transparent on cost when the postage was more than the product and not revealed until after the product was ordered and ready to ship

The screen seems mostly well made but there's major issues I don't like1) the squishy rubber bumpers are small and if used, they create gaps because it doesn't run the whole length. If you like gaps in your screens, you'll love it!2) there's no tabs to pull screen and get a grip easily. You have to push from the inside out which can mess up windows, paint, even your screens.We bought only 2 to test and unfortunately for the price and considering above - will not be purchasing for remaining windows.

Mike was great, but I wish the $200 upcharge ( regardless of quantity) was discussed up front. It may be legit but it sure comes off as 'scammy'. Reminds me of buying something off of ebay for $5, but S&H is $30 for a pet rock. Further more I received the order and the screen sizes I ordered 43" square, is less than the shipping container used. I am still waiting on a promised call for additional information regarding fulfilling my order. I also have a facility within the area and I could have had my own company carrier pick up the order, as I did offer that scenario.

Very disappointed. I ordered 5 screens and only 2 fit. It be because I got the heavier screen because of my pets which are the reason for needing new screens. The corners of the screen were particularly thick and knobby and do not fit in the channels. Perhaps it would have been a better fit with regular screen or perhaps if I decide to try again, I would give a narrower measurement so it wouldn’t matter if they didn’t fit all the way in. However, the 2 that fit are great.

Review.Titre: The screens look nice but pop out…
Review.Contenu: The screens look nice but pop out easily even with the bumpers they include. Two screens are small even though I measured the window with the tool they sent. I contacted them to see if I can send them back and get a replacement and they said they’re custom so no and if it was an error on their part they would charge me 10 dollars a screen.

Screens were the correct size per our measurements but don’t fit correctly in our 1950 wood double hung windows. We triple measured per the directions but somehow some screens are too tight and some bow in at the sides. One screen is already beginning to rip. Good in theory but probably only work on windows from 1970s and younger (metal or vinyl frames).

Review.Titre: Flex from the top and bottom not the sides
Review.Contenu: Despite specifying that my windows only have side pockets and not top or bottom, my screens arrived flexing from the top and bottom.Upon contacting customer support they explained that it’s due to my windows being wider than they are tall. My windows are only slightly wider than the height, and even so I don’t understand why this would have any bearing on where the screens flex from. As is, they require great force to install and are very difficult to remove. I purchased these under the impression through all the demonstrations that they flex from the sides in order to easily fit into the side pockets. Mine do not. Very disatisfied.

I've had several questions through the email that were very helpful. They responded quickly to any email sent. And one of the emails they recommended that on their website you can put in your sizes of the flex screen that you would like to order. In doing so the screens that were sent they did not fit. Very disappointed in the product size to large and I followed the website directions on how to me.

Review.Titre: I used the FlexTenna to measure the window…
Review.Contenu: I used the FlexTenna to measure the windows and followed the instructions and two of the screens don't fit on the sides and both screens had the same measurement for the living room windows.  Even using the bumpers provided the width doesn't fit.  Now we're not sure what to do.

Review.Titre: WHAT PRODUCT?  IT IS NOT CLEAR TO ME
Review.Contenu: I am not sure what I am getting when I order this FlexScreen.  Am I ordering a sheet of the screen, then molding it to a frame, or do I provide my own frame (new or old), then cut the screen to match whatever screen holder I have or have removed from my window jam.  It is not clear what I am ordering, even though your view may seem clear.

Review.Titre: I didn't know flex screen came with…
Review.Contenu: I didn't know flex screen came with Harvey windows. I wanted a screen I could raise to the upper sash where the shade would cover. I want clear views through glass.The half screen has no mechanism to raise the screen and stay in place. I wish Harvey explained that and I  wanted a traditional screen when ordering and not one that is static.Flex screen needs to develope a way to do this in their product. 21 bucks traditional Harvey screen vs 36 bucks flex that doesn't allow for customer flexibility. I'm not happy with Harvey Windows. Flex customer service is being understanding about my situation and I'm trying to deal with a solution that meets my needs. There is a disconnect with the flex screens and #Harvey windows.Harvey wants to charge $1500.00 for 17 screens because it's painted bronze which is a stock colour on their Tribute PVC windows.

Review.Titre: My husband measured our window for the…
Review.Contenu: My husband measured our window for the screen exactly as said and unfortunately the screen was to small.  The part where the screen isn't supposed to fit in an area, this screen fits into.  We had to rig it to get it to work, otherwise would of been perfect and just what I needed.  Maybe my window is just to old, still was frustrating it doesn't fit.*Correct, he measured for no pockets.  Our pockets are 4/16ths and your instructions said 5/16ths and somehow your screen still fits in the pockets when they should not have.  He exactly as the instructions said.*

Review.Titre: Flimsy and dangerous. Kids or pets? Don't risk it.
Review.Contenu: Moved into a house with flexscreens. Seemed fine until our cat saw a bird and jumped at the screen, pushed it out and ran off. We got her back after much trauma. We have 7 of these screens and they all fit fine, but they fit loose at best.  Online retailers say "all screens are designed to keep things out, not in. Any screen can be pushed out". Industry BS. Now we use expandable screen inserts on a couple windows and keep the other ones at about 4". If you don't have animals or toddlers, the screens are nice, but otherwise they present a hazard and are best avoided.

I had mistakenly posted a negative review of FlexScreen. I thought the review was for a 3D screen I'd purchased at Christmas, which I was not impressed with.My  sincere apologies to FlexScreen, I remember seeing them on Shark Tank and had visited their website for more information. Sorry for my misunderstanding.

Review.Titre: I saw FlexScreens on Shark Tank and…
Review.Contenu: I saw FlexScreens on Shark Tank and loved the idea.  I liked being able to order my exact sizes on your website.  However, now that they have showed up I'm not that happy.  On each side of the screen near the top and bottom the frame is smaller than the middle.  As a result it leaves gaps that flies and other insects can come through.

Review.Titre: Not as satisfied as I thought I would…
Review.Contenu: Not as satisfied as I thought I would be. Be careful when you measure. I ordered 6 screens and only 3 of them fit. The other 3 windows had these little tabs in the corners of the window that make it so the screens don't fit. Make sure, if you are measuring that you are finding the smallest part of the window and do the measurements from there. Also, I would go short on your measurements rather than trying to be exact. The bumpers they send with the screens can help secure them in place if there is any give. There is no adjusting these things and no returning if they don't work so I'm out quite a bit of money. When they do fit, it is just as easy as they claim it to be. Had I known this in the first place I totally would have measured different and I would have given them 5 stars.

Review.Titre: Product OK, customer service is lacking
Review.Contenu: The product is good for the cost and it does what it says and what you would expect.The negative I have is that I ordered 3 and 1 arrived cracked, packaging was terrible. I contacted customer service regarding the issue and never received a response. Customer service can make or break a company. I will not order again from this company because of the lack of customer service.2.06.19 - so the company responded to my review and asked that I contact them so they could make it right. I have called the 800 number and a recording says to email their support email address and the voice mail is full. I email support, get no response, call still can't talk to anyone. Frustrated. Gave them more than one opportunity to make it right. Like my original review stated - their customer is service is terrible!
Sizing instructions with their antenna were followed carefully, but screen too small.

Review.Titre: I love the screen but I had asked for…
Review.Contenu: I love the screen but I had asked for the additional plastic pieces to us since our opening is not quite square and have still not received them after I emailed them twice????

Review.Titre: We were really hoping these would work
Review.Contenu: Waited on the measure tool. Measured using the tool. sent in specs. screens look good but are too tight which flexes the bottom up. useless to keep bugs out.
I used the measuring tool both that was sent and the tool calculator online and it is far too small. And now I'm stuck with 3 screens that don't fit.

Review.Titre: The screens were larger than the…
Review.Contenu: The screens were larger than the measurements I sent by at least 1/16 of an inch width and height. I called customer service, they said they would call back to see what they could do for me and did not call back. Now I have $300 worth of screens that I can't use.

Review.Titre: I sent an email asking for information…
Review.Contenu: I sent an email asking for information and didn't hear anything back.  If this is their customer service, I'm not buying the screens

Review.Pseudo: John Window Depot Albany New York
Review.Titre: Its a good product but as I mentioned…
Review.Contenu: Its a good product but as I mentioned at the Window convention the screen material isn't tight enough customers say they dont like the look
Order process was much more difficult with more steps than should be needed. Annoying

Review.Titre: Not good install instructions and two…
Review.Contenu: Not good install instructions and two screens too big.

Review.Titre: 3 of our screens are the wrong size
Review.Contenu: 3 of our screens are the wrong size. They are marked correctly but actually measure too big.

Review.Titre: Using the 3/16 deduction does not work…
Review.Contenu: Using the 3/16 deduction does not work with my windows, that have virtually no lip on the vertical dimensions.
Was ready to order, only one screen, but then noticed the shipping was $35! No way...I'll just get the $10 screen fix kit instead...

Review.Titre: Not sure when website states "pay now…
Review.Contenu: Not sure when website states "pay now order later"
Cracked less than 60 days.  Disappointed.

The screens themselves seem like good quality, and shipping was fast.  However there is definitely a problem with their measuring system as I used the included Flex-tenna and followed the directions exactly.  I triple checked all my measurements and subtracted the amount they say is necessary for windows with pockets, but upon installation all of the screens were too big for my windows.  Three of them I was able to force into place with a lot of bending, but two are way too tall to fit and will now be expensive trash.  I understand there are no returns, but I wrote to customer service and never got a response.

Review.Titre: My order arrived in perfect condition
Review.Contenu: My order arrived in perfect condition. I was one day away from calling my credit card company to cancel the order. I ordered measured and paid for my order,almost four weeks later my order arrived, the week prior my credit card statement came. Their is no way of contacting them to see when your order will be shipped and no invoice in the order. I have one screen that is damaged and no way of contacting this place. Hopefully they will contact me to see how my order is.

4 out of the 6 screens arrived with screen not sealed to the frame.  Flexscreen is sending replacements, but with such poor quality control, I have doubts about the quality of the product.  I hope after years of excellent performance I will feel these were worth the expense and I can give them more stars.

Review.Titre: Screens are flexible and looked nice…
Review.Contenu: Screens are flexible and looked nice when new but definitely not as squishy as they appear in the ad or on Shark Tank. Must wrestle to install but slightly easier to remove (measured perfectly btw). Spots already drooping from pushing out screen to remove. High shipping fee also seemed like a hidden cost not evident from ads.

After my in-laws ordered a few screens, we ordered a test screen. It was a very easy install however not 100% tight on all corners but it did stay in place and did its job. We measured and ordered 7 more screens and none are actually tight enough to stay in place without physically altering the screen or window (i.e. caulking, weather stripping, adding a shim or even glueing). There is not enough tension to keep in place. We aren’t sure how this happened since the first did fit. Disappointed that we are now stuck with screens without a proper fit that will not work for us.

Review.Titre: Didn’t fit after using their measuring…
Review.Contenu: Didn’t fit after using their measuring tool! The flex part is a great idea but they need to have someone measure it as doing what they said didn’t work. Also the screen is already torn from the seem so not well made. Waste of over $150.

One fit. One didn’t. Also, the screen frame was a tiny bit too wide compared to the slot I have. The ‘measuring tool’ did not account for that width problem. Nice product, but getting the right fitting is not a perfect science.
They really should warn you that if your windows do not have tracks for the screens, they are going to leave large gaps.  I'm not sure I would have purchased them knowing that.
Even after multiple measurements the screens did not fit correctly.   And with no return you are wasting $.The product itself is a good idea but the execution is terrible.

I paid the money I filled out the form with all of the details on measurements and then waited three weeks and did not receive my product. I contacted support and was told that I did not submit something properly. They said they submitted it for me. Just makes no sense. I did what was asked of me and I pushed submit. To have it blamed on the customer it’s terrible customer service I probably should’ve given you one star right there.  They did not expedite the order I received it 2 1/2 weeks after I submitted a support ticket. They only sent me enough of the rubber bumpers for two of the windows even though I needed it for all of them so I had to contact Support again. The screens are high-quality and I appreciate that but this company needs to really work to get its act together when it comes to customer support and quality control.

Review.Titre: The fit wasn’t great despite using…
Review.Contenu: The fit wasn’t great despite using their own tool to measure. Screen keeps falling and looks flimsy
Prices were way to high.

Review.Titre: I don't understand the hype, folds and ripples everywhere
Review.Contenu: I don't understand the hype. They advertise invisible, and yet each one has so much extra material I can see ripples and folds when I look at any window from most angles (whether installed or not, so it's not a fit issue with my windows). Customer service was lovely and said it wasn't right, sent another set, and they're exactly the same. They look pretty bad.

Review.Titre: Product seems good, SHIPPING COSTS WAAAAY TOO EXPENSIVE
Review.Contenu: Product seems good, was easy enough to install. But "additional oversized shipping costs" are RIDICULOUS.  Charged over $250 to ship one screen (which you don't find out about until you have placed your order).  Paid it just to see what the product is like.  I have to replace all the screens in my house (15+ windows), not sure it is worth it with those shipping costs.

Although I am pleased with the overall look of the screen, I was not pleased with the quality control of the product. There are 4 places near each corner that are not welded to the frame and I’m sure with continued use those openings will worsen. It looks like maybe the screen was cut too short in those spots and didn’t get attached to the frame. Even though each one is a small area this  most certainly should’ve been noticed during an inspection after it was made.

Review.Titre: The screens are delayed in shipping and…
Review.Contenu: The screens are delayed in shipping and Flexscreen did not answer my email asking for an update.  I had to pay upfront, measure on my own, manually enter measurements.  I would expect better customer follow up related to issues.

Review.Titre: I’m a returning customer because I have…
Review.Contenu: I’m a returning customer because I have had positive experiences with Flex-Screens. Really like the Flex-Tenna measuring device.I do not understand why Flex-Screen reduced the measurements by a couple 16ths of an inch. This made the screens a little less snug in the frame.

Review.Titre: The screen separated from the edge when…
Review.Contenu: The screen separated from the edge when installed.  about a 2 inch separation.  based upon how fragile the screen is I would not recommend for the cost.

Review.Titre: I ordered several screens so was bound…
Review.Contenu: I ordered several screens so was bound to make at least one mistake in measuring.  I accept its my own fault! These are very good screens and SO easy to install due to their flexible frames. It's just unsettling how expensive they are when you realize one is unusable.  :(

Review.Titre: Not all need the measuring tool
Review.Contenu: I understand the measuring tool but not everyone needs that. I had to wait for the tool after paying which I really did not need. Plus I had to pay for shipping which I could have picked up at the store and saved some $$. The screens box came pretty beat up. Luckily the box was longer than the screen. The screen fits perfectly. Interesting how the screen is made to flex. Thanks for your appearance on Shark Tank otherwise I would never have known you exist

We followed the instructions for measurement and used the antenna tool but the screens are ever-slightly too big to fit within the tracks.  We placed them in the space and secured them with thumbtacks.  I would certainly prefer that they fit correctly, but did not see any type of money-back guarantee They do appear to be a high-quality product otherwise.

I ordered one screen. I liked that it came two days after I submitted my measurements. I have narrow pockets on the sides, so I used the bumpers. They confused me though, because it seems they will just make a space for insects to get in. All seemed well until the next morning, when I found the screen flopping outwards. I had to go around to the outside (which is an awkward spot) and tape the screen in all around. I could have bought a much cheaper screen if I knew I'd have to do that.

Review.Titre: I printed out the how to measure sheet
Review.Contenu: I printed out the how to measure sheet, paid a maintenance contractor to do the measurements ; however two of the 5 screens were too long. He measured so the screens would fit up in the grouve , but the frames are too wide to go in on the two older window frames.  Too complicated, plus expensive for half windows,  so I will not order  any more . Brenda Nix

The product is great. Even though I agree with the adage “you get what you pay for” the cost is prohibitive for outfitting my entire home and/or ordering one of these for a small window. Also, the ordering system requiring you to pre-pay before seems irregular and probably scares customers off who may think it is a scam. Finally, the ordering process had a glitch and a question to the vendor went unanswered.

I was ready to order from FlexScreen but I can't justify paying $35 for shipping on one screen. I work a lot with USPS & UPS and there's no way it costs $35 for a single screen.It's a great concept but I just can't see paying that much, going to work with more conventional options.
Screens came quickly and are good quality. However two of six did not fit, although I measured the same way on all windows.

Review.Titre: Product seems very good yet pricey
Review.Contenu: Product seems very good yet pricey. I believe a sub-$50 window price is a better target. I can redo 4-5 window screens for $14 with screen material  from the big box stores. Since it seems the screens are the same type I'd be paying a large premium for the frames which don't go bad that often.Note I have not yet purchased the product.

Review.Titre: I give the product 5 stars but I don't…
Review.Contenu: I give the product 5 stars but I don't like having to input the size until I have completed the order also, the price is a little steep if buying more than one. Is there any chance of a quantity discount?
Fit was perfect. Shipping costs are outrageous. Quality is great.

Review.Titre: Unable to make size of windows
Review.Contenu: Unable to make size of windows. Redid all windows with flexscreen except for 4 windows because they were a couple inches too tall

Review.Titre: I think this is a FANTASTIC idea, but....
Review.Contenu: I think this is a FANTASTIC idea, and I was so excited to install a FlexScreen in a second-story window where I regularly remove an awkward traditional screen to access a window flower box. The product arrived when promised, looks and bends just like the video, and seems to be of high quality. Unfortunately, the large size (height) of my double-hung window and the fact that it only has a single upper track to hold the screen make fitting the FlexScreen securely even more difficult than the traditional screen. There’s just nothing to hold onto, and the FlexScreen has nearly dropped two stories more times than my heart can take. So the FlexScreen is going to live in a box under the house, and I’ll go back to using the awkward traditional screen in my window. I would recommend if you have large windows, especially ones with only single tracks to hold your screens, that you start by ordering one FlexScreen to be sure they work for you since your purchase is not refundable/returnable!

the screens seem to be good. i just got them.  the 2 things that i think could have been better is they could have the measurement so you just put the actual size in and it calculate the size you need. The consumer should not have to do math.  I don't thing it would be that hard to have a program that did that. Second I got 10 screens and they came in 2 boxes but were not marked the size. and most of the windows were very close in size, It would have helped to have them marked which window they go in.

Review.Titre: The company quoted one price when they…
Review.Contenu: The company quoted one price when they premiered on Shark Tank but by the time I went to the website to order the price had increased 500%! Each screen is $80! That’s pricey for a small screen and to order 25 screens it makes this product too expensive.

Review.Titre: One of my screens came bowed and it is…
Review.Contenu: One of my screens came bowed and it is bent when I installed it. Now I have it sitting out since it looked horrible. The others fit perfectly!

Review.Titre: Not for my Milgard awning windows
Review.Contenu: Because where the screen sets in the window is only 1/16" depressed. There is a gap at the corners. But service is outstanding.

Review.Titre: Great product, terrible shipping and delivery
Review.Contenu: The product is great and the ordering process is super well designed but the shipping and delivery is severely lacking.

Review.Titre: The process was quick and easy though
Review.Contenu: The process was quick and easy though. I didn't have to worry about buying custom screens.

Review.Titre: Not quit what I expected and its not so…
Review.Contenu: Not quit what I expected and its not so flexible like the presentation.
Good product, bad hooks. Did not stick well. Maybe 3M adhesive would work better, that’s what I used.

Review.Titre: What is measured and what is made…
Review.Contenu: What is measured and what is made including recess is not the same
Looks awesome, just a little too expensive for me.

Review.Titre: I love the idea of the Flexscreens and…
Review.Contenu: I love the idea of the Flexscreens and they likely work great for those who have pockets for the screens. I didn't and I also have wood frames.I think because I have wood frames it made measuring more difficult. Even though I checked my measurements multiple times when the screens arrived only 2 of the 4 fit.  I used the bumpers but that left small spaces for smaller bugs to get inside.

Specifically ordered enough screens to qualify for free shipping only to be slapped with an extra shipping fee of $200 because they were oversized screens. No where did it mention an additional fee for oversized screens or what that oversize was.

Box came damaged and tape coming off all sides but the screen was okay.  I do not have a channel for the screen to fit in and so using the rubber tabs that were included and I was able to get the screen seated.  But in doing so the rubber tabs change the height which causes the screen to bow in the middle such that there is a gap between the screen and the window edge.I ordered one screen to test it out to see if I could use it on all my 2nd story windows.  At this time I don't think that I can use them since the screens bows out slightly but the gap is large enough for bugs and flys to get in the house.

Review.Titre: Three out of four worked great
Review.Contenu: I think I would probably give at least 4 stars but I reached out via email that one of my screens does not fit, is too big. I bought 4. Tried to be as precise as I could with the measurements. 3 screens work pretty well but not sure why the 4th one is so big? I know there is no refund but thought when I contacted FlexScreen someone would get back to me to see what can be done. Just beware & be very, very, careful with measurements & double check. No refunds!

Although very prompt, the tool you provided to measure was flimsy in the middle where it screws together, this must have created a slight bow.  This added to the measurement and the screens don’t fit properly bow out creating open spaces on the sides.

Review.Titre: Poor visibility even with FlexScreen Clean
Review.Contenu: I purchased FlexScreen Clean which is advertised to give superior visibility. However, they still tend to be thicker and block more view than a lot of the conventional screens I used. Given it's easy to put on and at the very least keeps all the bugs out, I'd give it a 3.

Review.Titre: Wanted to leave a 5 star response
Review.Contenu: Wanted to leave a 5 star response. A little disappointed. I actually waited for your measuring tool, which made it easier, before I submitted my measurements. I then very methodically measured 6 Windows.  None of the windows fit flush. I had to use the included rubber bumpers to tighten the fit. I like the quality and clarity of the screens. But we live in a very windy area, so a flush, tight fit is necessary to avoid rattling. I have many more windows in my house. I like the concept of your screens. But I have reservations on ordering any more.

Review.Titre: I ordered 4 screens none fit right
Review.Contenu: I ordered 4 screens, each labeled (in the ordering process) however the the screens were not labeled when they arrived. There is a gap with each screen, as they were smaller than ordered which will let in bugs.They were easy ro put in, but the fit is not correct.

I ordered 2 Flexscreens. The first one came within a couple of weeks and was absolutely fine. It was as advertised. The second screen was ordered in February 2021. I was sent the wrong size as confirmed by the measurements that I sent and the mis-measured windows that I got. I called customer service and was promised the correct size screen. That was in February. The correct screen came in May. That is not a spelling mistake. It was May. That also was after numerous phone calls and emails. That pretty much explains my 3 star rating.

Well I got my screens but so far I have only installed one and that one fit extremely tight and even has a little wrinkle to it but not really noticeable. I thought I measured quite accurately. But maybe not. Anyway even though I anticipated using the bumpers as my slots are only 1/4" wide, I was not able to use them in this first window,  but the screen will stay put the way it is, just wonder about how much I should subtract on the other 11 windows I still have to do. I think my windows are a little strange maybe. I will call and discuss my issue before my next order if I decide to stick with flex screen.  Will have to see how the other 5 fit. As far as durability,  only time can answer that.

I loved the screen but had some issues. I used the FLEX-tenna to measure and my screen fits. however the frame was cracked when it arrived. I had read other's reviews that said there isn't much the company will do for that issue. I was able to get the frame realigned and get it to fit snugly in the window. But I cannot remove the screen without causing more damage. I'd suggest packaging large screens better. It was basically just a piece of cardboard folded around the screen. if there was a bit more padding I think it would have been safe. maybe some styrofoam around the edge of the frame.

Review.Titre: One of the 4 screens has loose screen.
Review.Contenu: I do like the flex screen and they were easy to install. HOWEVER, one of the screens was not made flat and there is a looseness of the screen. I may call to see if this can be replaced. I think that it should.

Review.Titre: Screen material is loose and not a great fit
Review.Contenu: When I first placed the order for my FlexScreen, I was under the impression I would be getting the screen delivered. However, the first shipment I waited for was only for the measuring tool. I understand why this is important, but I didn't expect there to be two steps to the process - I wish that was more thoroughly described when you place the order. Despite using the measuring tool, the frame came in slightly too narrow. Thankfully it still fit because the height was perfect, but the screen material itself is also a bit loose, which means if you press on it at all, the sides of the screen pop out of the window frame. I suppose this is still easier than trying to create a screen yourself, but I am a bit disappointed for the amount of money I paid for this.

Review.Titre: Using the flextenna and the suggestions…
Review.Contenu: Using the flextenna and the suggestions on measurement was easy but the screen thaty was sen was a biy small for our space. am going to have to use weather stripping to prop in the screen.
Measurements are very specific to fit actual window. Ours did not fit, customer service did help us resolve issue and ship new ones for an additional cost. The quality of the screen is very average.

Review.Titre: Be prepared to pay and wait
Review.Contenu: I still HAVEN'T received my screens!They make you pay up front for the product and shipping and it’s been weeks and I still haven’t received my screens! Just find a local contractor to help you, it’s probably about the same price and you actually get what you pay for.UPDATE We received our screens roughly 4/5 weeks after paying for them. The turn around time was less than ideal but the product itself is great. If you need something quick this isn’t the bear option (we had a broken screen hence the order and hence the frustration.) We could have gotten something cheaper and quicker from a local contractor.  I’m updating this from a one star to three. If I could get the screens in a timely manner it would be 5 stars but have to pay for screens up front and wait so long was inconvenient.

Review.Titre: Follow-up. Customer service did an excellent job
Review.Contenu: Customer service did an excellent job. But I have to admit that the measuring process was difficult, we  followed the instructions, both orders were incorrectly measured. We were provided a measuring device after we placed both orders. Unfortunately both orders cost us hundreds of dollars and now we're stuck with two orders of screens that don't fit. Great idea, a great product, great customer service, But the measuring and ordering can definitely be improved in some way to make it easier for the customer. Follow-up, Unfortunately, the measuring tool was not provided or wasn't available when we made our purchase(s). All we found, at that time, was instructions on the Flexscreen web site. We ordered the tool when we placed our second order. Having that tool would have saved us hundreds of dollars....

The screens are constructed well and are easy to install. I very much like how clear they seem.I did not like the ordering process of paying first, just doesn't instill a sense of trust. But the pricing is certainly competitive.The measuring process is ridiculous, I don't know why you can't just measure your current screen; and if you get it wrong they do not accept returns. In my case, I forgot to take off a bit on just one side to account for the windows that are no longer perfectly square. I'm left with screens that are slightly too big on one side which means it has a gap where it should sit in the track. I should've just measured the old screen.I like the easy installation but that doesn't outweigh the issues described above. I will not be ordering from this company again.

Review.Titre: This appears to be a great product
Review.Contenu: This appears to be a great product, but not tight around the edges for taller screens. We'll wait and see if it can withstand winds without blowing out.
Flexscreen is a nice product.To make it the best, offer it in white as well as black.Most important I know this is difficult, but for the price it needs to be repairable.

Review.Titre: I need a video on how to install in a…
Review.Contenu: I need a video on how to install in a pocket-less window.  I can get them to stay in.  I get one corner in and another one pops out.
Poor communication, high shipping costs for larger pieces, website interface very clunky. For a normal, small window, one screen at a time, it’s fine.
I bought 8 solar sceens
Great idea and protect, very price

Review.Titre: Good product but beware of $150 oversize shipping fee!!!
Review.Contenu: The Flexscreen product seems well made and Im happy with it so far.  The only reason I am giving 3 stars is due to the outrageous shipping fee that I was charged. The Flexscreen website advertises free shipping.  I ordered 7 screens and at the time of ordering there is a small disclaimer that some orders may have an oversize shipping fee. But there is no indication of how much that fee might be or what dimensions incur oversize fees.  So I paid for my order in full and then submitted my measurements right after.  Again there was nothing that indicated that my specific order had oversize fees.   2 weeks later… I get an email saying that owe another $150 for shipping because my screens were deemed oversize!!  I contacted support to reduce this fee and they said I had to pay it or cancel my order which I had already waited 2 weeks for.   This was a really poor customer experience. Why not tell customers up front about these shipping fees at the time of placing the order?  So for anyone considering buying Flexscreens beware that if your screens are anything but small you might be charged with $150 shipping fee 2 weeks later.
The product ordered is late being delivered and we are still waiting.
I didn’t receive the bumpers, how do I get them?

Review.Titre: they are bowing in the middle

Review.Contenu: Great screen that fit perfectly. I wished the net was more under tension.
It's a nice product. Easy to install, but they do not fit perfectly.

The product is fantastic. One of my screens looks like its pulling out of the corner of the frame I sent a picture of it earlier and would like support for it, but wow I'm super impressed with how perfectly they fit and how well they work!

Love how these fit so nicely.  Four stars because they really look shabby around the edges.  The screens are raggedly sticking out from the frame.  Luckily, this is not seen when the screens are in place.  I have channels the screens fit into.
Good sturdy product, fast turnaround.Friendly & helpful customer service team.Looses a star for only taking measurements in inches & fractions of an inch, as oppose to millimetres.

Review.Titre: The screen measuring input screens are…
Review.Contenu: The screen measuring input screens are not user-friendly.  When trying to copy the same measurements from one to the next, resulted in changing the dimensions.  Also, there should be a way to directly input the dimensions you want your screen to be, based on the company's recommended gaps.

Great product, I was concerned about paying for something before actually ordering it. Did so research and found your company to be legitimate.  Great product we’ll see how long they last. Can you do anything on pricing? Almost want to put new screen in the old frames. Lol.

Having to pay a flat rate up front regardless of screen size is a turn off. Customers would be much happier if they only pay for flextenna up front then pay set pricing dependent on actual screen size. Screens work great though but are very pricey.

The screens arrived when promised. They are easy to install and do the job.I had to remind the company to send the Flex Tool after waiting over a week for it.The tool was easy to use and when I called the company for additional measuring instructions I was given the correct information to accurately measure my windows.

The process of measuring and ordering was great! We followed the instructions to a T. Upon delivery, we were concerned because the shipping box was a bit beat up - but, the screen looked fine. Placing it in the window was easy peasy, but we were  a bit dismayed that it isn't a perfect fit. it doesn't have the tightest fit in the lower corners. It'll work fine enough, and we are satisfied with the quality. We believe that when following the directions to subtract according to the chart given, that is why it isn't the perfect fit. All in all - a good product!

We worked with Mike in customer service. He made it very easy to place the order and to report our measurements. We did disagree, however, with FlexScreen's instructions to take accurate measurements then subtract 3/16" from those measurements. Those instructions result in a very loose fitting screen.

I am very happy with my screens, they were easy to install.Only gave 4 stars as: The ordering process had me a little confused, but that was probably my fault.
