I didn't realize that I would be charged when I placed the order without giving my measurements, as I was planning to wait until after the holidays to actually order them as I didn't want them to get ruined during the Holiday rush.  But to my surprise they all made it successfully. Nice screens.

Review.Titre: The whole process seemed very lengthy
Review.Contenu: The whole process seemed very complicated and EXPENSIVE.  For the price we paid, it seemed to talk a long time, I think it was like 1M end to end, which given paying $35 in shipping seems much too long.Given there are other products on the market, maybe not as good but at a fraction of the price, might try them next time.

Review.Titre: Great product but measuring is tricky…
Review.Contenu: Great product but measuring is tricky for old house with windows out of square. Directions didn’t account for this issue and made fit less than ideal and harder to install

Review.Titre: Glad they have a flexible screen.
Sorry it took so long for the review…
Review.Contenu: Sorry it took so long for the review but it was too windy to attempt installation until today. To my great relief and somewhat surprise, both screens fit perfectly. I was nervous but used the old adage - measure twice, cut once - except I measured at least 3 times. They fit perfectly, look almost invisible and are a great solution. I'll order the rest for the bedroom windows in the next week or so. Thanks much for  great job.

Order process and easy installation were great!To improve:1. Price point is high, 2x or maybe even 3x that of a conventional screen.2. The screens don’t have great tension. Little waves appear if looking at an angle.
Easy purchase Good instructions on measurements with adequate warnings.Received mine- they fit well and snug. They are flexible as marketed but not as durable as I expected.

Great product, but too pricey for new construction market. We use in replacement windows only and especially when special colors are offered, eliminating the need to match the screen frame with the window color. Figure out a way to reduce the cost to manufacture and you have a grand slam!
Overall, these screens are high-quality, easy to install, and fairly priced. The only drawback is that they sag slightly along the top crossbar for very wide windows (50in+).

Love the screens, but your measuring instructions need to be a bit better.  All 3 screens came in about an 1/8" short on all sides, luckily the stick on foam you send was enough to make up that difference.

Review.Titre: I'm happy with the screen and the…
Review.Contenu: I'm happy with the screen and the contacts I spoken to at FlexScreen.  I purchased two screens and one was just a little too big, but I blame that on the fact I had to measure from inside the house rather than climbing a ladder and doing it from the outside.  I blame it on me not FlexScreen.  The other one fit perfectly.  I would buy screens from FlexScreen again, but would measure it properly from the outside nexttime.

Review.Titre: We and our customers love the screens!
Review.Contenu: We and our customers love the screens!The only thing that keeps me from giving you a 5-star is the labeling system.I would like each screen to reflect the label/customer name in order to make sorting them out easier.

Review.Titre: Pet Durable With Fresh Air on the Side
Review.Contenu: I am enjoying my new FlexScreen® Window Screens. I purchased 4 x Standard Window Screens for two bedrooms and 7 x FlexView Tuff Window Screens for rooms that my rambunctious pets frequent. They know what a screen is but, when they see an occasional squirrel, lizard or other critter through the window they just have to go check it out. Sometimes that's straight through an open window. My expectation is the Tuff screen and frame will withstand their excitement. I like the idea of the durable screens, and the frames fit perfectly based on the measurements I supplied (I was a bit nervous about providing the correct measurements). I thought the ordering process was unusual. I had to pay in advance for the type and number of screens I wanted to purchase before the website advanced to providing measurements for each screen I just purchased. I also thought the price per screen was a bit over premium but, was willing to pay the price with the assumption the screens would hold up over time. I give the screens 5 stars 🌟🌟🌟🌟🌟 and the price 4 stars 🌟🌟🌟🌟.

Review.Titre: The screens look great but they were a…
Review.Contenu: The screens look great but they were a little off on the height.  The width was perfect but somehow the height was off by 1/4 inch.  I measured 3 times about took off 1/8 inch as directed because I had one channel at the top.  I used the measuring tool provided but somehow still off.

Review.Titre: It has been a good while since my last…
Review.Contenu: It has been a good while since my last and first purchase. At the time I was pleased with the purchasing process. The delivery of the screens went well. I am looking forward to my next oder.  As a reseller the experience and process I am certain will become even better.

Review.Titre: The product was great but the…
Review.Contenu: The product was great but the instructions on measuring for size left a lot to be desired.  These instructions were very confusing and my measurements were a little off from what I needed - no second chances!!!

Review.Titre: 4 of the 6 screens fit perfect not sure…
Review.Contenu: 4 of the 6 screens fit perfect not sure why but the two bathroom window screens were nearly too big and I measured them the same as the others.
love the product!; However online buying experience was crude/strange, didn't seem fully baked.  My Flexscreen arrived faster than expected (Sunday delivery)

In order to simplify the FlexScreen ordering process the website, package tracking process, and warranty registration actually feel clunky, kind of like a recipe missing a few steps making one wonder how it will all turn out.  Bottom line, you have a great product so take the next step of improving the ordering process.
Screen fit is very accurate! Follow the Flex Screen instructions carefully and seek assistance when necessary.

Review.Titre: Is not flexible as much as I thought it…
Review.Contenu: Is not flexible as much as I thought it would be but does flex. As such it was not as easy to get in as I hoped but seems to be a very durable product. With quality & look, I’m not sorry I purchased.

Review.Titre: Great screen but not cheap.I would have rated the screen a 5 but…
Review.Contenu: I would have rated the screen a 5 but felt the cost was awfully high for a small screen like mine. Maybe a 2 or 3 tier pricing model?

Review.Titre: High quality screen products only one…
Review.Contenu: High quality screen products only one problem 2 screens are a little short in height.
Good concept and performance, a little pricey for some applications
Great product, great response time. My only negative? A bit "pricey!"
Quick fulfillment, nice fit...we'll see how they last

Review.Titre: We like it a lot but it fell out the…
Review.Contenu: We like it a lot but it fell out the 2nd day when we weren’t home so now we put 4 of the rubber stops in . Just waiting for a windy day with the windows open to see if it stays. Looks nice and easy to install. I saw you on Shark Tank great presentation they should have supported you but they couldn’t get a good return since they seems to be quality and not junk that breaks and you have to replace often. Good luck !!

The screens are great! It is simple to measure and if you do it right they will be good. The only issue is the packaging! It needs to be more sturdy and have down or something to protect the screens. One screen had a rip in it and I already heard the customer service isn’t so good so I not going to worry about it. But the packaging needs to be updated with some foam

The screens are awesome!  Overall it was an easy process to order, wait for the measurement tool, submit the measurements and install the new screens.  One star down due to the measurement site being down and the fact that no one answered their customer service phone.  Did receive an email after a day that allowed me to submit my measurements.Overall highly recommended.
i liked the screens. but i think were way over priced. i bet a good 50.00 profit on every screen.

Review.Titre: The entire process was easy and…
Review.Contenu: The entire process was easy and explained in detail.  The quality of the products exceeded my expectation.  The only reason I didn't give 5 stars was the difficulty in getting accurate measurements.  Using the measuring tool provided, and taking three (3) separate measurements for both height and width, I still came out about 2 mm wide.

Measuring 150 year old Victorian windows is tough!  Even with the guides, I still feel like I could have went 1/8th inch less on top and bottom.  The good thing is the screens are flexible so they are working.  Just not the perfect fit I hoped for, but after some window repairs (i.e. removing 150 years of paint build up) I think they will be perfect.

Review.Titre: My only complaint was the length of…
Review.Contenu: My only complaint was the length of time receiving the screens.  I had to email the company to ask why I had never received them.  Their response was immediate and I received the screens within 2 weeks of asking.   I am very pleased with the screens- they were easy to install by myself ( 70 and female ). I have deleted my emails but think I waited about 2 months instead of 2 weeks.

Review.Titre: The screens fit great and were shipped…
Review.Contenu: The screens fit great and were shipped extremely quickly once they were ordered.My only criticism is the ordering process. Once I had indicated how many screens I wanted and paid I thought an email response would be imidate on the sizes. I'm not sure what the problem was but I was not contacted until later. The email went to another filter of promotions when it did come, not your fault, but then it went unnoticed by me for quite awhile and I thought I had been scammed by a fake site. I had in that meantime sent an email to customer service and was not responded to by Flexscreen.All my other orders have gone through Home Depot without a problem.

I love the product and they fit perfectly.  The only problem is that some of the coating on the metal frame was chipped and one was even a little rusty.  I don't think the chips and rust will be a problem in the long run... just don't like seeing it on something I bought brand new.

I'd probably would still be waiting for for my screens if I hadn't called to find out the status of my order. In any case the screens did arrive and I was quite pleased with them. One screen was about 5/16 inch short. I made it work. Another screen had a minor tear in a corner. And a larger screen (54 inches wide) which had the right dimensions would "hour glass" so that there was a gap between the screen and the frame. I am disappointed about the "hour glassing"  but am overall pleased with Flexscreen.

Review.Titre: 3 out 4 screens for this order were…
Review.Contenu: 3 out 4 screens for this order were 'spot on accurate'. The 4th was cut to short length wise and as a result of this problem it falls out of the window that it was intended for. Otherwise, I am happy with the quality of these screens.Regards, TLG.

Review.Titre: Very pleased with the end result
Review.Contenu: Very pleased with the end result. Great quality product. The process of measuring is a bit fiddly. Wish the tool used to measure had a locking component. Had to measure a number of times because I was worried it had slid a half inch or something. Would (and have) recommend.

Review.Titre: FlexScreen was easy to order and install but needs better markings
Review.Contenu: FlexScreen was easy to measure and send in the order. W bought ten replacement screens for our screen room. Most of the screens fit well, though some of our window frames were a little un-square. I did not give FlexScreen five stars because when the screens arrived they were not visibly or easily matched the individual screens within the order. I had to go back to customer service to find out that the screen had etching on the side frame with information, though that was hard to read. I ended up just measuring the screens to determine which window opening they matched up to. It would be better if the window screens had "tags" on them that matched up the screen to what was enetred on the website.

Review.Titre: Great screens not so great measuring instructions
Review.Contenu: The screens themselves seem great. I got the flex clear and they are nearly invisible. Really easy installation and removal. Will make keeping the windows clean a much easier task. Would be 5 stars except in the instructions for measuring they tell you to remove 3/16” (I think that was the amount but whatever it was was the length I removed). However all of my screens were then about 3/16” too small. Had to use the included bumpers. And even with those the screens don’t fit as snugly as I would like. Wish I had just submitted my actual measurements. But with the bumpers they work well enough and overall I would buy again.

Review.Titre: I really like my flexscreens and have…
Review.Contenu: I really like my flexscreens and have them all installed.  I did have some trouble with a couple of the measurements where the sides weren't completely parallel and there was a gap, I ended up putting some weather stripping on the edge to seal up the gap.

Review.Titre: Overall we love the screen, but
Review.Contenu: Overall we love the screen.  We did not receive 8 bumpers, I went to the web site to see if we could get 4 more bumpers or buy more bumpers, it has been a couple of weeks and I still have not heard anything or any acknowledgment that they received my request.
The measuring was alittle tricky, they seam to fit good. But I found the screen a little loose not tuant. And this may have something to do with the type of screen not sure they are.

Review.Titre: Great product but took longer to get…
Review.Contenu: Great product but took longer to get than advertised.I did receive my product fairly quickly when I called and reported that I had not gotten shipment on time as advertised----screens are a great alternative to ordinary rigid frame screens.

Review.Titre: Flex screen was good using FedEx not so…
Review.Contenu: Flex screen was good using FedEx not so delayed 2 times then said it would be delivered on a Monday came Sunday while we were gone have to watch for porch pirates

Review.Titre: The measuring guide tool is not…
Review.Contenu: The measuring guide tool is not entirely accurate. Following the video of using cardboard boxes sounded like a good idea but the screen looks so unfortunately a little too long and goes beyond the window screen frame.
Ordered 13 screens.4 were off just a bit?Measured multiple times.2 are real tight and 2 are loose.Other than that the rest fit fine and was easy to do. Would probably order again…not sure?

Review.Titre: Great screens! Delivery a little slow
Review.Contenu: The screens are great! I received them at the end of the estimated window and without the bumpers. An easy call to the company and I received the bumpers in the mail a couple of days later.

Review.Titre: Screen fits perfectly and easy to…
Review.Contenu: Screen fits perfectly and easy to install. Only problem was, when received, a 3-inch section where the screen material had separated from the metal frame. Fixed with duct tape.

Product itself is exactly as advertised--amazingly easy to install and I like the quality of the product (keep in mind that I have never ordered a new window screen in my life.)  There are a couple of small areas on the screen where something went wrong with the paint on the screen--but the screen is going up on a window usually viewed from several feet away so it was not noticeable enough to request a replacement screen.I subtracted one star because it took five weeks for the arrival of the screen.  If there was going to be a delay (I was given an estimate of 1.5 - 2 weeks after submitting measurements), it would have been so helpful if FlexScreen notified me of the delay.  In the end, I had to reach out to FlexScreen around week 4 to find out what happened to my screen.  At that point, it hadn't even left their facility.
Great product. Great value. Works exactly as described (and seen on Shark Tank.) Only criticisms: the complicated measuring process and the extended delivery time.

Review.Titre: Love the quality of the screens
Review.Contenu: Love the quality of the screens. Personally I had a issue measuring as my windows are a wacky size. The measuring tool was very helpful!
Love the products, easy to get correct measurements. Works as good as expensive. Excessively expensive in my opinion, especially the shipping.

Review.Titre: Measuring guide needs to be simpler
Review.Contenu: Measuring guide needs to be simpler. Have two screens out of twelve that ended up on the snug side as the frames us slightly different.
Very good quality! Fast delivery. I think there are more of these screens in our future. GOOD IDEA
Everything was good, just took longer than expected to receive measuring tool

Review.Titre: Product is high quality and performance…
Review.Contenu: Product is high quality and performance is great.  We could not be happier with it

Review.Titre: Forget trying to talk to someone if you have a question or problem
Review.Contenu: I like the product, but was unable to talk to customer service with a question.
So far so good, we shall see!
Order fulfillment was good as was the packing of the goods

Review.Titre: How much will you pay me to write a review?   You know I paid a lot
Review.Contenu: Sure my hourly rate is…..

Review.Titre: I love them but need to explain…
Review.Contenu: I love them but need to explain measuring better
Good product. Is as advertised.

Much of my reason for the four stars instead of 5 is because the company would not ship to my home in Puerto Rico.  I had to have them shipped to my daughter in Florida, and then I paid for the shipping from there.  SO MANY vendors ship here, I just can't understand why some still do not. The screens themselves seem to be good.  They are flexible, which is the primary reason I needed them.  I did not test how durable they are, fearing that they would not be durable enough, so in that, I can not advise.  The screen material seems to be fused to the frame.  There are spots where the screen material is hanging off after being fused, and I hope that does not provide a snag that will cause the screen material to be pulled from the frame.  I was very careful not to pull those tabs.I purchased 5 of the FlexView Solar, and two of the Flexview Clean. I had asked the question "Does the hydrophobic water repelling coating keep rain from coming through the screen?".  The answer was that if any of the screens could do that, this would be the correct choice.  After installing the screens, I find that water is not repelled by the screen.  It still comes in.  I have not had rain on the other screens, but the water repelling screens allow rain to hit the glass, where it seems to remain far longer than glass with no screen.  A minor annoyance, until the water dries. My final comment would be about the price structure.  I am sure that people who need full height screens to cover both upper and lower windows, are very happy.  However, for those of us who only need half a screen to cover the lower window only, we are not so happy with the price.  It would be nice if there were different prices for smaller screens.The reason I purchased these screens was that they were my only choice.  I had installation of roll-down storm shutters (Puerto Rico) and they left absolutely no room to remove the original screens for cleaning without bending the frame.  I am happy to have these screens available and love how they do not obstruct the view.  I hope that they hold up to many years of trouble free use. Shipping was fast and the screens fit perfectly.

I liked all the amenities connected with this company from start to finish. When a business is rated a five star, they are the best. So, by giving them a six star means that they go above and beyond expectations. ******

Review.Titre: Had great experience with flex screen
Review.Contenu: Had great experience with flex screen. Ordered the flex view clean. Wify is happy with the look of the screens and view from inside the house looking outside. They were so easy to pop in. I received my flextenna for measuring on aFriday morning and had my 10 windows measured and order completed by late Friday afternoon. Once submitted said I would receive in 10-15 working days but holy cow I received my 10 screens the following Wednesday just 5 days later counting the weekend. Everything came as ordered and clearly marked on each screen which window they went in. Couldn't have been easier.Before ordering I had contacted flex screen by email with questions on 2 different occasions and Mike was quick to respond each time with my questions clearly answered so customers service seems on the ball ,also. Measure carefully and follow flex screen's instructions and screens should pop right into place as shown on videos. Do not measure your old screens or you will  have problems. Can't speak to longevity since I have had less than a week but should hold up for years to come.

Review.Titre: I must say that I was extremely happy…
Review.Contenu: I must say that I was extremely happy and impressed with the entire experience. I forget the gentleman’s name but I initially had a problem ordering on line. It was a Sunday and I knew no one was in the office so I emailed my issue and a gentleman called me first thing Monday morning and I was able to order my screens. After I uploaded the measurements the screens came in about 5 days. I installed them last week and they fit perfectly. They were so easy to install. The only hard part of the entire day was cleaning my windows!I will highly recommend these screens to anyone who asks me.
Exactly as advertised. Very happy with my purchase. Easy to do with the measuring tool sent. Everything done in a timely manner. Will purchase again.
The screens that I order turned out great! They were easy to install and fit perfectly using the included adjustment pads.
Terrific product, customized and fit perfect on my windows. I will be purchasing more screens for my hoe and I will highly recommend them to my friends and family.
everything perfect from start to finish...easy to install...this s the best screen out there

Ordering was easy and shipping was quick. I received a free flextanna beforehand to measure my windows. If you are going to measure the opening, make sure to use the “help me measure” on the measurement page. This will adjust the size automatically when you input the window opening measurements. Otherwise you will have to measure the opening and then minus out 1/16” from the width and 1/16” from the height to get the adjusted size. Mine fit perfectly. I will definitely order more for my other windows.

Review.Titre: My new Flex Screens were extremely easy…
Review.Contenu: My new Flex Screens were extremely easy to install!Perfect fits as well.
Great customer service (Mike). Ease of installation.Quick delivery
The screens came very quickly. Certainly saved us money over ordering retractables and THEY FIT PERFECTLY. They don't obstruct the view at all!

At first I was skeptical about the process pay first and then get your screens but it paid off well. The screens work well, I love them!!!! Thank you guys and they helped me out because I wasn't computer savvy.  Appreciate all your help!!!! Thank you!!!!

FlexScreen superbly responsive to any issue. Constant-contact behavior. Mind you, not pushy. Once & done support. Entering an order is a learning curve. Just read screens carefully. I ordered 7 screens and wish They could simply be numbered lieu of Dining room, Den, Bedroom etc. I was compelled to re- order 6 due to my mistake in measuring. It's odd customer must subtract 3/16". Couldn't the "screen maker" make that adjustment? As a precaution, I subtracted 1/4", lieu of 3/16" and " fit" still tight.

Had sort of been in the market for window screens, as most of mine were either bent or had holes or tears in the screens. Hadn't jumped on replacing them, as I was concerned that I'd bend and misshape the frames when installing them. So when I saw these, I immediately ordered. The process was simple - get your flextenna and take measurements, then enter them online. About a week later, I had my screens. They were packed well and arrived in mint condition. Installation was a snap, and every screen fit nice and snug. Excellent product. The only improvement I'd suggest is to put little tabs at the midpoints of the edges to allow for easier installation and removal.

Review.Titre: Prompt delivery, quality product, easy to install
Review.Contenu: The instructions were clear and easy to understand. Deliver was prompt and the quality was great.

Review.Titre: Responsive Company will make sure you are satisfied.
Review.Contenu: We had an issue with FlexScreen 2 years after installation.  Michaela fixed the issue within one week.  It is uncommon to do business with a firm that acts to correct an issue with expediency.  I can see that they are all in and serve customers to their best ability.

Review.Titre: Great fit for Andersen E-Series screen door
Review.Contenu: I needed to replace a damaged screen insert in an Andersen E-Series door. FlexScreen’s process was so easy. I measured (without the measuring tool), entered the numbers on the web site, and a few weeks later, received the new screen. Installation was easy.FlexScreen’s web site allows sizes larger than FlexScreen through Home Depot - which I needed because my door is taller than the maximum screen height on the Home Depot website.

Incredible product! As a landlord who takes care of his properties, I have been WAITING FOR THIS EXACT PRODUCT. The window companies have us stuck between a rock and a hard place but not anymore my friends. Triple check your measurements and purchase ASAP. Shipped in 5 B days, Installation was a breeze. Product is flexible but STURDY. I could not be happier. Also, Here We Go #412

Recently moved to an old home with no screens and odd-sized windows. I read about FlexScreen but was skeptical, so I only ordered three. They fit perfectly and are easy to put in and take out. So much better than aluminum frames!!! I'm getting ready to order five more.

Review.Titre: Best product of you need to remove your screens!
Review.Contenu: We added Bahama shutters for hurricane protection and all of our old screens broke trying to get them out so we could close the shutters from inside on the second floor. We ordered Flex screens and couldn’t be any happier. I found them easy to remove and install as we have to do it often to lubricate the shutter mechanism. The ordering process is super easy and they send you a tool to get precise measurements. I had to call customer service as I made an error on my input page and Mike was so helpful! Our screens arrived within a week and the are beautiful.

I have been needing screens for windows for years but didn't know where I could get them without building them myself.  I saw a FlexScreen advertisement and knew it was what I needed. I purchased one to see if I liked it.  I LOVED it. Will be purchasing more to finish the unscreened windows. Thank you so much for this awesome creation!

Ordered my first FlexScreen. The ordering process was simple and the provided detailed instructions on how to measure for the installation of your new FlexScreen. Received my order in about 10 business days and installation took less than a minute. I love the way it looks and I am seriously thinking of replacing all of the screens in my house with FlexScreens.
Great product quality.  The only downside was the timing of the entire process. From order placement to window measurement to screen delivery was 16 days.

I like to give a good review unless I am totally disappointed.  Especially when I am taking the measurements.  I did like the quality of the screening.  I did think it was rather expensive.  But tried to get screening for a few years and your company was the only one that would make it.

Review.Titre: Mike in customer service is great
Review.Contenu: Mike in customer service is great.  Quick and thorough responses. FlexScreen policies encourage continued use, and referrals from me, as they are fair and flexible(no pun intended).And it's a great product.

I couldn't be more impressed with these screens and the whole ordering process. I had been looking at them for years, finally decided to buy them. I used the measuring tool and the screens fit perfectly, I mean absolutely perfectly. I have windows that only have one pocket at the top and the screens still fit perfectly and snug, snapped right into place, and I didn't need to use the retention bumpers.

Review.Titre: It was an easy order process
Review.Contenu: It was an easy order process. I had originally ordered 5 screens with plans for 2 to be doorway size. But had to request a refund as I did not realize the door size ones would come with such a high shipping charge. But the site made it super easy to request the refund.I placed a new order for just the windows I wanted new screens for, they fit perfect.

Review.Titre: Easy measure, shipped quick, seamless fit
Review.Contenu: I had some screens with holes and bent frames.  Initially, I looked to replace them with the same kind of screens but decided to give FlexScreen a shot. I'm glad I did!  It took a little longer as I had to receive the antenna measuring device first. Measuring was guided on the phone and simple. The estimated ship date was 14 days from the order, but I received the screens within 4 days!  The screens popped into the windows easily.  This is definitely the way to go if you're replacing screens!

Review.Titre: Great quality screens and customer service
Review.Contenu: The screens are great and the customer service was excellent. Two of my screens were damaged in the process of installing them, and FlexScreen sent me replacements as quickly as they could. Just a heads up that while easier to install and remove than standard screens, it's still possible to have the mesh tear off of the frame and to warp/break the frame, so be careful. If it's seeming too difficult to install from indoors, try outdoors.

I was skeptical… Believe me… But I trusted the system and figured that if it was not true, it was going to be on me. WELL…we were pleasantly surprised (My hubbs and I) how perfect the system is and how beautifully these screens fit into our already existing storm windows where the screens had been broken. I will definitely use this company again when I have the need for more screens and would recommend you try this product.

I truly couldn't be happier. Our home swaps screens for seasonal window a/c use and our old screens would constantly bend, rip and come undone. Our home looks so much more buttoned up. FlexScreen is a wise investment and can't wait to order the remaining screens we need.

Review.Titre: Pleased so far, time will tell…
Review.Contenu: The screens fit. Easy to install. Poor to no shipment notification, I had to make contact to get shipment information. Not sure if these will last due to the way the screen is glued to the frame in the Central Valley heat in California. Overall pleased so far. The bug/insect screen is dark which is a bonus.

Review.Titre: Easy to order, quick to arrive and effortless to install!
Review.Contenu: Easy to order, quick to arrive and effortless to install!We used a measuring tape to calculate the size of the screens needed and it was the hardest part of the process. If you are not sure - wait for the tool provided by the company.Our screens arrived in couple of days, exactly the size we needed and were extremely easy to install.We choose the “waterproof” version, but didn’t have rain yet to see them in action.They are almost invisible.Overall- easy and pleasant experience.

Review.Titre: Don’t hesitate, these screens are amazing!
Review.Contenu: We remodeled an older home that had Pella windows.  The Pella company decided it was a good idea to stop making screens for the older windows. It is a must in Texas to have a screen to open a window during the 5 days of cool weather. I came across an ad for the flexible screen and took a chance. I ordered the measuring tool and 1 screen to see if it was going to work. It is PERFECT!!!! I am putting an order together for the rest of the windows. Love these screens! Thank you for solving a “what are we going to do” situation.

Review.Titre: Customer service was incredible..Thank You Mike!
Review.Contenu: Customer service was incredible especially from a gentle called Mike. Thank You Mike. Because of his generosity I will be ordering more screens and so will a few of my neighbors.

Review.Titre: I was afraid to try and measure myself
Review.Contenu: I was afraid to try and measure myself, but Sandy walked me through the process like a champ.  The screens arrived in perfect condition and I was able to install in a matter of minutes.The screens are exactly what we wanted.Truly a great American Made company that we will be purchasing from again.Wonderful customer service.

As a newcomer to FlexScreen, I needed assistance to correct my original measurements. FlexScreen Customer Service Rep. Mike, could not have been more helpful. He walked me through the process and ten days later I had new, perfectly fitting screens. And I love them! Bravo FlexScreen.

The process was excellent. I placed my order for the pet safe screens and received the free measuring tool. I entered my measurements and followed the easy directions and my screens fit perfect and look beautiful.  FlexScreen even labeled them so I knew which windows they went to! Super easy to install!

Ordering screens online - I was skeptical.  Skeptical about the measuring process, the material's appearance, the fit with my windows, and customer service.  Well, they proved me wrong.  On all counts.  Their measuring instructions were clear.  They provided a handy tool (for free) made the task easy.  The material was exactly as described.  The flex in the product makes install and removal very easy.  The fit is excellent.  So based on practical first person experience, yes I fully recommend.

Directions on website for measuring were spot on!Screen fits perfectly!  And, the bumpers make it an even more secure fit.  I did pay attention to a prior review about handling edges with care.  I do love the clean look of the screen too!

Review.Titre: I NEEDED FLEX SCREEN CUSTOMER SERVICE…
Review.Contenu: I NEEDED FLEX SCREEN CUSTOMER SERVICE HELP AND MICHAEL WAS VERY PROFESSIONAL AND THERE EVERY STEP OF THE WAY.
Easy to calculate the measurements. And the screen arrived very shortly thereafter.

The process was easy to follow, everything shipped quickly, and the screens were a perfect fit. I received email updates throughout the process to keep me informed on the status of my order. This was a flawless experience start to finish.

It was easy to measure and submit the order. It does take a few days to get initial rod to measure but well worth it. The you just submit those measurements online and your screens get made. When I got my screens was amazed at how beautiful the screens are and how easy they are to install. They fit perfectly, no issues.

Review.Titre: Excellent customer service, process and product
Review.Contenu: Very easy ordering process. Very detailed and easy to follow measuring instructions.  Quick delivery and response. Screens fit exactly as they should and we are VERY happy with this company.
Replaced 2 screens and measuring tool helped to get a tight fit so the screen would stay in place; even with no pockets on the sides of one screen.

I love the Flexscreens! They were so easy to install and it doesn’t obscure your view like most screens do. You barely notice they’re on the windows. I have already ordered more and will definitely recommend them to anyone. Thank for the awesome screens!
Instructions for measuring excellent.  The screens fit excellent.  All is good,  just hope they last 20+ years like the original screens when the house was built did.

Review.Titre: Easy and looks great and keeps bugs out.

Review.Contenu: The product and service are both top notch!  Michael was VERY helpful on email and the phone with ordering and measuring.  Shipping was fast and communication great.  I am NOT a DIY kind of person and was worried about installation, but it was easy enough even for me!  I put in 10 screens in about 15 minutes and we absolutely love them.  Much better than the old ones.

Great customer service. They were quick to respond to any questions I had. The measuring tool really helped to get the exact size and I really appreciated the websites help in automatically adjusting the size entered, depending to the type of frame the screens go in.

Review.Titre: Measure and call CS to verify length and pocket  … the screens are awesome,looks great, fit is great.. very happy with purchase.. we got the solar screens..
Review.Contenu: We got the flex tena .. did the measurements.. Called CS.. very helpful.. made our account.. put In measurements and size was adjusted to exactly what the CS had verified with us..arrived in damaged and they fit perfect..

Review.Titre: Purchase process was quick and easy
Review.Contenu: Purchase process was quick and easy. Customer Service very responsive to my questions. Measure tool made the process quick and easy to insure the correct size. Screens arrived quickly, installed easily and look great.

Excellent customer service. Had several product questions. The Rep sent screens samples. We ordered a total of 6 screens. Received the Flex-Tenna within a day of the order. After providing the screen measurements, within a couple days later I received an email (tracking#) saying the screens were shipped. FYI...We don't care for the look of the solar screens from the outside of the house (to dark, not stretched tight enough, wavy) but are very happy with the small insect screens. Just hope they work.

Review.Titre: Works for Casement windows with no pockets
Review.Contenu: The process of paying first and without the measurements seem a bit scary for me at first but I decided to give these screens a try.  I followed the instructions and watched the videos and to my surprise these screens are PERFECT! They look very elegant, minimalist, and not bulky at all.  We have casement windows so ours don't have pockets (tracks) but they have the perfect measurements and solutions for every window type. When we moved into the house, the workers told us there was no way to install window screens and I'm glad they are wrong.  I will be ordering a few more for other windows. They are a bit pricy but the quality is great and the service is fast and easy.

Very happy with FlexScreen!!  Purchased two replacement screens for bedroom windows.  Screens arrived about 10 days after the order.I can truthfully say it took longer to unbox the screens than it took to install them.  Install was about 1 minute for each screen.  Each screen snapped into place with a perfect edge to edge fit.Next time I need window screens, I'm buying them from FlexScreen.

If you can use a measuring tape, you can get the best window screens at great prices.  Ordered a pair of replacement screens about 10 days ago.  They arrived today.I can honestly say it took longer to unbox the screens than it took to install them.  Such an easy and effortless install, it took less than one minute per screen.  Would recommend FlexScreen to anyone needing replacement screens.Dr. Thomas GroyGilbert, AZ

Review.Titre: New home now has beautiful screens…
Review.Contenu: I recently purchased a house that had no screens on the windows. I’m a pretty handy guy, but the thought of making up some ugly traditional aluminum framed screens got me thinking about Flexscreen’s. So, I ordered the number of screens needed and waited for the flextenna to measure the openings. I followed their instructions and in a few weeks I had my new screens. They came labeled (great idea) and installed easy. They look sharp, fit great too. The purchase process went smoothly start to finish. It’s simple, just follow the well tailored instructions they provide and you’ll be set.

Review.Titre: I have older windows and I washed the…
Review.Contenu: I have older windows and I washed the screens one day and leaned them against the garbage cans to dry. I forgot them and I guess the garbage company thought I wanted to throw them out. My husband does construction and kept saying these aren’t regular windows they’re old and odd sized & you’ll never find new screens. Well I came across flex screens I waited for the measuring tool, I measured on my own and presto now I have great screens. They fit perfectly. My husband said “what’s this it genius!!

Review.Titre: My window washer recommended these as…
Review.Contenu: My window washer recommended these as several of our screens were broken or I’ll fitting.  We order a few to see how they fit. Perfect!  Will be ordering for the rest of the house !

Everything!  When I had a question prior to purchase, I received a helpful answer almost immediately.  Entering measurements & placing my order was simple and fast.  Delivery was as promised.  Most exciting is the quality of the screens I received and I was thrilled that they all fit perfectly and look great.

After reviewing the flexscreen products I placed an order. They sent me a flex measurement tool. After receiving the tool, I watched the video on how to measure. Followed their instructions, and about a week later received flexscreens that fit perfectly.We do not have a screen pocked on our windows. So, I was a bit concerned if they would work. The snug, nearly perfect fit, keeps the screens tightly in place.Far better than any other screen product I have ever used.
Very satisfied with product, and people at Flex Screen were helpful. Also, time from order to delivery was fast!!’

We love the flex screens - so easy to insert and remove when needed.  They look good too.We provided measurements which were met exactly.Cost is also very reasonable.A very good experience so far - we have 10 more windows and look forward to the same results as above.

Review.Titre: Flexscreen is an affordable screen replacement
Review.Contenu: I have been in need of two window screens in my house for years but it was always expensive to have somebody make one for you until I found flexscreen.  When the screens came in I thought they were too large at first but they fit like a glove. They look great. I can now open the windows to get fresh air in those rooms without letting bugs in.  I will be recommending flexscreen to friends and family.

The screens came to the exact measurements I provided.  The frames are flexible enough to allow for easy installation and rigid enough to stretch the screen so there's no "waves" in it, even on the larger size I ordered.  I will never build a replacement screen again.

Review.Titre: Easy to follow guided instructions for…
Review.Contenu: Easy to follow guided instructions for taking measurements, fast delivery, and responsive customer service. Regular metal screens were almost impossible to replace in my windows without breaking the screen. Flexscreen was much easier to insert. Thanks!
Super easy to order, measure and install. Much easier than expected.

Review.Titre: I'm in love with my new Flex Screens
Review.Contenu: I'm in love with my new Flex Screens! I had two very difficult to remove and reinstall window screens which resulted in frame damage and Flex Screens were the perfect replacements for them. Everything about the ordering process was a piece of cake and the fit and finish of the screens was perfect. Thank you!
I had the screens installed within an hour of receiving them. Super easy to install and they fit perfectly based on my measurements.

I somehow mismeasured one of my windows, and FlexScreen offered to remake it for me and all I would pay is shipping. Since I ordered 7 screens, not having to buy another one was awesome. Thank you so much!
The FlexTenna made measuring much easier (1). The screens were individually labeled and made sorting easier (2). And they all popped right in place and fit perfectly (3).

I ordered three screens for my greenhouse windows.These are large windows so I was not sure if the Flex Screen product would do what I expected. I measured and ordered. When the screens arrived, about a week and a half later, I was surprised at how well they were packaged. It took me longer to unpack than it did to install. The screens fit well and are working as expected. My only complaint is, that they were not marked which screen went with what window.

Review.Titre: Product is as good as it is advertised…
Review.Contenu: Product is as good as it is advertised to be. The order and sizing process is over thought. Order one screen, follow the guidelines for ordering and then once you have it and you know what you are doing, order the rest.

My window frames are tough and getting old. I measured VERY carefully and they all seem to fit pretty much how I measured. We will see about any difference in heat blockage but I’m glad to finally have screens on my home.

Got the screens today, but have opened the box.  What has made this a memorable experience is that I emailed a question about holding the screens in place and was answered competently and quickly.Also, the screens were mailed out within a few days of sending in the measurements.Great job to all.

Review.Titre: The screens fit and they were not…
Review.Contenu: The screens fit and they were not damaged. Very nicley packed. Our windows look great again. My only recommendation is that when entering the measurements on the website, I was unsure about the deduction. It was not clear of the exact way to figure this but it worked.
Flexscreen was very responsive and helpful in getting all of my screens in and accurately doing so.  I ordered 4 but I will be ordering more.

This product is amazing. So easy to install and aid so much more sturdy than what I had before. I don’t have a standard type of window so a “normal” screen would not work but Flex Screen has provided an exceptional product for me and I am so happy!! Thank you!
Screens fit well.  Shipping was unbelievable.  Attention to detail and screens were protected from damage.  Thank you.  I am getting ready to order more.

10 of the 11 screens I ordered fit perfectly.  The one that didn't was my fault for an incorrect measurement.  I called and spoke to Michael, who helped rectify the situation with minimal effort and cost.

Great customer service great window screen. Sturdy and strong. However I did measure wrong and they were willing to make a new one at a cheaper cost but that was my fault regardless. But they helped me and are awesome!

Review.Titre: 9 window screens in less than 20 minutes…
Review.Contenu: Everything was so easy they sent me the measuring tool to measure my windows. Once I did that I sent them the information. My screens arrived within two weeks, and they fit perfectly. I installed all nine screens in less than 20 minutes and I love them. I absolutely love them. Thank you so much!

Review.Titre: From start to finish the experience and…
Review.Contenu: From start to finish the experience and process was flawless. The screens are just perfect, look great, and less expensive than having the local people build new screens.

Review.Titre: If you get the measurements perfect
Review.Contenu: If you get the measurements perfect, this will be the best purchase you have made.  For the measurement that fits into the groove of my window frame, I rounded down 1/8th inch just to be safe as I did not want it to be too big, but I could have gone up as well.  Still fits like a glove and looks great!  Worth the price.

Review.Titre: New Fkex Screen purchased from Home…
Review.Contenu: Used the FlexTenna purchased from Home Depot. Got precise measurements and then ordered online. Screens came and a perfect fit!
If you measure right,  these are the best screens ever, they fit perfectly, and only take a second to install them!

The ease of measuring and then installing these screens was wonderful. The frame is sturdy even while being flexible. The screen type I choose has kept many bugs out as well. Very pleased with this purchase!
Very quick shipping. Excellent product. Works as described. I like that the screens are very thin to fit into older windows. They work exceptionally well. No complaints.
Everything went super smooth I wasn’t sure what to expect out of the whole process but everything was perfect fitting and a lot less expensive then going with Pella for the screens

Review.Titre: Great and quick option for screens
Review.Contenu: The screens were made and shipped quickly. The longest part was waiting for the measuring tool. I used it to get all my measurements for 4 screens. Two fit perfectly, one fits decently, and one not so great. The one that’s not so great is just a bit too wide so it bows out on the bottom. This may have been my user error in measuring.

Review.Titre: so easy to measure the tool and…
Review.Contenu: so easy to measure with the tool and enter the measurements on the website the product came quickly, and installed perfectly
Received screens as expected.  They all fit perfectly in my windows.  Very satisfied.  Will be ordering more in the near future.
Bought for a rental. Easy measure and perfect fix. Easy to install and remove. Have referred to friends as well. Will be buying additional screens for my house!
The measuring tool makes things a cinch. The screen shipped fast after I entered the measurements. Installation was a breeze. Thanks guys!
Quick turnaround. Clear instructions very easy to implement. Perfectly fitted result.  Installs in seconds.
Easy to order, they fit perfect and with all videos on website the instructions for measuring and fitting was great. Delivery was faster than expected. Great service?

Easy to order. Measuring instructions very detailed and final measurements calculated for you. Arrived within 10 days. 1 screen was fractionally difficult to install,  but it does fit. Satisfied with product.

Review.Titre: Ordering was easy and the technology…
Review.Contenu: Ordering was easy and the technology was great!I work on a college campus and we go through a lot of screens. So the ease of measuring and ordering is a game changer for us.
